RelatedSentence: The Palestinian Education Ministry on Monday officially inaugurated a Turkish high school for girls in the occupied West Bank 's Ramallah and Al - Bireh provinces in cooperation with the Turkish Cooperation and Coordination Agency ( TIKA ) .
Turkish Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan participated in an inauguration ceremony via videoconference from Turkey .
